name: Wind and Freedom
description:
During this turn, after one of your characters uses a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.
(You must have at least 2 characters from Mondstadt in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>During this turn, after one of your characters uses a Skill:</color> Switch your next character in to be the active character.\n(You must have at least 2 characters from {SPRITE_PRESET#3401}Mondstadt in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>During this turn, after one of your characters uses a Skill:</color> Switch your next character in to be the active character.\n(You must have at least 2 characters from {SPRITE_PRESET#3401}Mondstadt in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: "Someday, the winds will blow towards a brighter future."
